title: Vase, ca. 1912-1920
markings: On underside; "Morrisware" over a crown surmounting a scroll marked "S Hancock & Sons," over "Stoke on Trent, England," along with "C7-13" and a underglaze green script  signature "GeoCartlidge."
provenance: 2013, Given to Cooper-Hewitt by owner Harry C. Sigman
description: Lead-glazed earthenware with raised slip outline; purple flowers and dark green leaves and stems and a band of small purple flowers over a mustard-colored ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Vase, ca. 1912-1920.Lead-glazed earthenware. Gift of Harry C. Sigman. 2013-21-13.
